short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your ChatGPT experience, manage chats in folders, save messages, pin messages, and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your ChatGPT productivity to the next level with ChatGPT Organizer. This Chrome extension adds essential features to streamline your workflow:

Folders for Chats: Organize your conversations effortlessly with customizable folders.
One-Click Prompt Reuse: Save your favorite prompts and access them instantly for repeated use.
Enhanced Management Tools: Additional features to keep your chats and prompts neat, accessible, and efficient.
Simplify and supercharge your ChatGPT experience. Install ChatGPT Organizer today!
